goal.core.agent

Class GOALInterpreter<DEBUGGER extends Debugger>

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.core.agent.Controller
      • goal.core.agent.GOALInterpreter<DEBUGGER>
  • Type Parameters:
    DEBUGGER - class of the Debugger used by the interpreter.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IDEGOALInterpreter, UnitTestInterpreter

    public class GOALInterpreter<DEBUGGER extends Debugger>
extends Controller
    Interpreter for GOALProgram. The interpreter can be provided with a Debugger that will be called at specific points during the interpretation. A Learner will be consulted during the Adaptive sections of a GOALProgram.
    Author:
    mpkorstanje

      • initalizeController

        protected void initalizeController(Agent<? extends Controller> agent)
                            throws KRInitFailedException
        Description copied from class: Controller
        Initializes the controller with the agent it controls. Subclasses can override this method to do their own initialization against the agent. Subclasses should take care to call super method.
        Overrides:
        initalizeController in class Controller
        Parameters:
        agent - controlled by this controller.
        Throws:
        KRInitFailedException - when the controller could not initialize the KRLanguage.

      • reset

        public void reset()
           throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                  KRInitFailedException
        Description copied from class: Controller
        Resets the agent. To reset the agent it is first stopped and then started again.
        Overrides:
        reset in class Controller
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - when interrupted while waiting for the agent to stop.
        KRInitFailedException - when unable to initialize the KRLanguage when restarting the agent.

      • getRunnable

        protected java.lang.Runnable getRunnable(java.util.concurrent.Executor pool,
                             java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.util.concurrent.Callable<?>> in)
        Description copied from class: Controller
        Runs the agent. This method is called by the Process and will have its own thread. Subclasses should implement their agents logic here. Care should be taken with regards to thread-safety and responsiveness (e.g. don't ignore interrupted exceptions).
        Specified by:
        getRunnable in class Controller

      • updateAgentAvailability

        public void updateAgentAvailability(AgentId id,
                           boolean available)
        Makes agent aware of existence of other agent with id AgentId.
        This call is NOT thread safe. Agent may crash if this is called from another than the agent's thread and agent's beliefs are updated while agent is iterating over them.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of other agent that is introduce to this agent.
        available - true if agent is available and needs to be added; false if agent is no longer available and needs to be removed.

      • dispose

        protected void dispose()
        Description copied from class: Controller
        Open to client implementation; does nothing by default. Called upon stop with disposeOnTermination
        Overrides:
        dispose in class Controller
